messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] drinking water
messages.msgSnippet: When I was last in contact them Grace
messages.messageBody:
<< P.S. I'm looking for an ISP in So Calif that doesn't require HSLDA
insurance. Can you refer me anywhere? >>

When I was last in contact them Grace Christian Schools (an umbrella school)
did not require this insurance. They are a Christian private school but I
don't recall if they expect any statement of faith. They are located in San
Diego.

Kris

messages.subject: drinking water
messages.msgSnippet: what was the recommendatino for a 40 pound boy? I think any danger of drink ing too much would be drinking too much at one time [like gallons,et c??? P.S.
messages.messageBody:
what was the recommendatino for a 40 pound boy?
I think any "danger" of drink ing too much would be drinking too much at one
time [like gallons,et c???

P.S.  I'm looking for an ISP in So Calif that doesn't require HSLDA
insurance.  Can you refer me anywhere?

Rachel in Southern California
